description.p: Divisé is a Coolbooter-esque app which is capable of arm64 Dualboots and Tethered Downgrades, all from within the app! Checkm8 is used to tether boot the second OS, after dualbooting/tether downgrading.
Ramiel on macOS is required to boot the second OS.
Divisé is a fork of Succession (made by samg_is_a_ninja),
